output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, CMF 11240015 is present, indicating this is electoral material.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly refers to "Marcel Ciolacu," who is a presidential candidate (Position 3).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - It's a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Significant reach (20,000-24,999 impressions) - Addresses broad issues affecting young people - Uses hashtags to increase visibility
4. Electoral objective: Yes - Directly criticizes a presidential candidate - Explicitly promotes USR as "singurul partid" - Uses hashtag "#NuVotatiPSD" - Clear intention to influence voting behavior
5. Journalism: No - This is not journalistic content - Contains political messaging and party promotion - Uses campaign-style rhetoric
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication (USR Brăila) - Structured as campaign messaging - Contains CMF number
The post clearly constitutes electoral propaganda as it meets all criteria under Article 36(7), and being active after the conclusion of the presidential campaign period makes it a violation.
572976648757324
This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Direct criticism of presidential candidate - Clear electoral messaging - Paid distribution - Explicit call not to vote for PSD
TRUE
ION-MARCEL CIOLACUNEGATIVE
USR
USR Brăila, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj electoral platit (ID Facebook: 572976648757324) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală prezidențială, respectiv după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea conține elementele specifice propagandei electorale: număr CMF (11240015), critică directă a candidatului prezidențial Marcel Ciolacu, îndemn explicit de a nu vota PSD (#NuVotatiPSD), și promovare politică cu obiectiv electoral clar. Mesajul a fost distribuit ca reclamă plătită pe Facebook și Instagram, cu un impact estimat între 20.000 și 24.999 de afișări.
